ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Which of the following storms affected you most directly? (Mark one)
Notes: 1= Hurricane Laura (August 2020); 2= Winter Storm Uri (February 2021); 3= Hurricane Ida (August 2021); 4= Hurricane Fiona (September 2022); 5= Hurricane Ian (September 2022); 6= Other; 7= None

ElementDescription: Which of the following storms affected you most directly? Other, specify
At any time during or after storms that happened during 2019-2022, were you unsure about the safety or whereabouts of any family members or close friends?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a family member INJURED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a family member LOST as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a family member KILLED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Family member not injured, lost, or killed as a result of the storm
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a friend INJURED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a friend LOST as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a friend KILLED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Friend not injured, lost, or killed as a result of the storm
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a pet INJURED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a pet LOST as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was a pet KILLED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Pet not injured, lost, or killed as a result of the storm
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was an acquaintance INJURED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was an acquaintance LOST as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Was an acquaintance KILLED as a result of the storm?
Thinking about the storm that affected you most directly: Acquaintance not injured, lost, or killed as a result of the storm
Did you stay in a shelter during or immediately after the storm?
Did you stay with family or friends who live nearby during or immediately after the storm?
Did you stay with family or friends who live outside your community during or immediately after the storm?
Did you stay in a hotel during or immediately after the storm?
Did you stay in another place during or immediately after the storm?
Did not stay anywhere else during or immediately after the storm
Altogether, what was the extent of the damage to your home from the storm?
Notes: 1= Not damaged; 2= Damaged, but someone could still live in it; 3= Damaged so badly that nobody could live in it; 4= Destroyed

ElementDescription: Following the storm, how much help were you able to get from your community?
Notes: 1= All of the help I needed; 2= Most of the help I needed; 3= Very little of the help I needed; 4= No help; 5= I did not need help

ElementDescription: Due to COVID-19 or any other disasters that occurred since 2020 (such as hurricanes or winter storms), have you applied for or received any of the following? Individual Assistance from FEMA
Notes: 1= Applied for; 2= Received; 3= Wanted to apply but did not; 777= Not applicable

ElementDescription: Due to COVID-19 or any other disasters that occurred since 2020 (such as hurricanes or winter storms), have you applied for or received any of the following? Property damage insurance claim
Notes: 1= Applied for; 2= Received; 3= Wanted to apply but did not; 777= Not applicable

ElementDescription: Due to COVID-19 or any other disasters that occurred since 2020 (such as hurricanes or winter storms), have you applied for or received any of the following? Disaster loan from the Small Business Administration (including the Paycheck Protection Program, Economic Injury Disaster)
Notes: 1= Applied for; 2= Received; 3= Wanted to apply but did not; 777= Not applicable
